sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { StudentsService } from '../../services/students.service'; import { Grade } from '../../models/Grade'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-student', templateUrl: './add-student.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-student.component.css'] }) export class AddStudentComponent implements OnInit{ grades:Grade[]=[]; selectedGrade:any; constructor(private fb:FormBuilder,private studentService:StudentsService){} ngOnInit() { console.log("11") this.studentService.getGrades().subscribe(grades=>{ this.grades = grades.data; },error=>{ console.log(error) }); } formStud = this.fb.group({ name:['', Validators.required], address:['',Validators.required], school:['',Validators.required], grade:['',Validators.required], }) changeGrade(event:Event) { console.log(event); } addStudent(){ console.log('Student Added') } }

Basic Info

Name is Required
Address is Required
School is Required
Grade is Required
